text: John Arthur Frederick Poole (12 December 1932 â€“ 17 November 2020) was an English football goalkeeper. He made 33 league appearances for Port Vale in the Football League between 1953 and 1961. He later played for non-League sides Macclesfield Town and Werrington. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Sportspeople from Staffordshire
title: John Poole (footballer, born 1932)
